Ali Dance.effect: Halves enemy hit rate when attacked

Angelic Grace.effect: Doubles evasion against non-Almighty Magic attacks

Cool Breeze.effect: Recover 8% HP and SP after battle

Cruel Attack.effect: 35% crit, Dmg x1.5 on Downed foes

Dodge Elec.effect: Doubles evasion rate against Elec attacks

Dodge Fire.effect: Doubles evasion rate against Fire attacks

Dodge Ice.effect: Doubles evasion rate against Ice attacks

Dodge Physical.effect: Doubles evasion rate against Phys attacks

Dodge Wind.effect: Doubles evasion rate against Wind attacks

Endure.effect: Survive lethal attack with 1 HP once per battle

Enduring Soul.effect: Survive lethal attack with 100% HP once per battle

Enervation.effect: 40% Enervation (-50% St Ma En, Forget current order)

Evade Elec.effect: Triples evasion rate against Elec attacks

Evade Fire.effect: Triples evasion rate against Fire attacks

Evade Ice.effect: Triples evasion rate against Ice attacks

Evade Physical.effect: Triples evasion rate against Phys attacks

Evade Wind.effect: Triples evasion rate against Wind attacks

Evil Touch.effect: 40% Fear (-Crit Def, Lose turn or escape)

Fast Heal.effect: Halves time to automatically recover from ailments

Firm Stance.effect: Halves damage from all attacks but can never evade

Golden Right.effect: Deals medium Phys damage to 1 foe with a chance of Fear

Insta-Heal.effect: Automatically recover from ailments in 1 turn

Last Resort.effect: Kills self and deals medium Almighty damage to everyone

Makajam.effect: 40% Silence (Cannot use skills or change persona)

Pulinpa.effect: 40% Confusion (Lose turn, attack ally, or waste 3% money)

Recarmdra.effect: Sacrifices remaining HP to heal all allies

Revolution.effect: Greatly raises crit rate for 3 turns

Salvation.effect: Full HP restore, Cures all ailments

Sharp Student.effect: Halves crit rate of damage received

Victory Cry.effect: Recover 100% HP and SP after battle

Vile Assault.effect: 5% crit, Dmg x1.5 on Downed foes

AoA Level 1.effect: Increases All-out Attack damage output to level 1

AoA Level 2.effect: Increases All-out Attack damage output to level 2

AoA Level 3.effect: Increases All-out Attack damage output to level 3

AoA Level 4.effect: Increases All-out Attack damage output to level 4

AoA Level 5.effect: Increases All-out Attack damage output to max level

Complete Analysis.effect: Reveals all elemental affinities on all enemies

Enemy Radar.effect: Reveal the location of Shadows on each floor over a wide area

Full Analysis.effect: Displays enemy stats, resistances, and skills

Healing Wave.effect: Recover 5% HP to party after battle

Kamui Miracle.effect: Random effect to all allies, foes, or universal: HP and SP recovered, Down, Random ailment, Nothing

Relaxing Wave.effect: Recover 5% SP to party after battle

Stamina Song.effect: Recover 10% HP to party after battle

Third Eye.effect: Changes target icon to show when attack will be ineffective

Treasure Radar.effect: Reveal the location of treasure chests on each floor

Vigor Song.effect: Recover 10% SP to party after battle

Weakness Scan.effect: Reveal an enemy's affinity at the start of battle
